In a word: amazing. As our waitress explained, the menu changes daily so they can serve incredibly fresh food. My wife and I had the best mussels we've ever had here, along with great fish and a chicken, mushroom, and rice dish similar to paella. To top it all off, their menu is very affordable. We came in with €26 in our pockets, and left with the best meal we had during our honeymoon. Great atmosphere, great staff, great food.
